price: Na zipo nyuso siku hiyo zitakao kunjana.
footnotes: Na nyuso nyengine zitakuwapo zimenuna, zimekunjana mno, zinangojea zitendewe jambo ambalo kwa kitisho chake linavunja uti wa mgongo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
